headline: Top Dividend Stocks To Consider In December 2025
summary: As the U.S. stock market navigates a challenging landscape with AI stocks under pressure and economic data closely watched, investors are increasingly seeking stability amid volatility. In such an environment, dividend stocks can offer a reliable income stream, making them an attractive option for those looking to balance potential risks with steady returns.
